entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:09 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:09 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:09 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
